Detailed Description

The ProxyData class will hold information about the proxy server to be used.

Constructor.

Parameters:
proxyEnable Whether proxy is enabled or not.
proxyType The type of the proxy server.
proxyHostName The proxy host name or IP address.
proxyPort The proxy port number.
enablePassword Whether authentication should be performed.
userName The user name to authenticate to the server.
password The password to authenticate to the server.
